extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the most popular card game ever - Klondike Solitaire (Solitaire in short). Our version of this classic Solitaire game differs enormously from the other hundreds of mostly cloned Solitaire games on the market.This Solitaire version is especially optimized for every screen and the entire range of Android enabled devices: from tiny smartphones to the biggest tablets. We created an ideal Solitaire game for a touchscreen and the gameplay is very easy and natural for your fingers.Make your own Solitaire game unique and exclusive, express yourself! You can change the game's appearance to suit your own taste, choose the card sets and background, or even adorn the card back with your dog's photo. Klondike Solitaire has many various options and modes; you can even play the Vegas variant of Solitaire.You will love how easily and intuitively the Solitaire stacks are dragged and the game itself drops only suitable cards and returns others back to the deck. Just relax and enjoy the game and don't worry about control, Klondike Solitaire will handle it!Play Klondike Solitaire today and have fun! Compete with other users, set high scores! Spend your time with pleasure, turn boring waiting time into relaxing entertainment.We created a product of brilliant quality for you. So please, spend a bit of your time and comment on Klondike Solitaire, or just rate it. We appreciate your comments and suggestions, which is why Solitaire becomes better with every new release. Visit our Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/AndroidKlondike in order to communicate with us, your friends, and other users, and share your opinion. If you have any questions, e-mail our support team.Try more Solitaire games from Softick: Freecell Solitaire, Pyramid Solitaire, Spider Solitaire, even more solitaire games...and 21 card games in the Solitaire Arena collection!We also created Solitaire games for other devices: iPhone/iPad, Palm PRE, and Chrome.Solitaire, Klondike Solitaire, Patience Solitaire, Android Solitaire, Softick Solitaire, Free Solitaire, Tablet Solitaire, Solitaire Game, Solitaire Card Game

reviews.comment: Very good game! Its fun that you can choose whatever pic you want for the back of the card..I have a pic of my new grandson #6!
reviews.author: Karen Clayton

reviews.title: What Happened?
reviews.comment: Updates have ruined the flow of this game.  Card changes were in real time now so fast u don\'t know if u actually initiated the move or not.  Give me old game back and u can keep the ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very addictive....
reviews.comment: Play this game a lot,  it\'s certainly the best solitaire game I found,  and,  I tried lots first.....

reviews.title: Problem with 1080hd screem
reviews.comment: Error displaying large downloaded cards and a 2gb ram device. Error \'not enough memory\'!  Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Upgrade request:  No solution/Brand new game button
reviews.comment: I really do like this game (it\'s one of my faves), but I\'d like to be able to start a new game immediately when I see there is no solution, instead of having to close that box, bring up the menu, and click New Game twice.  One click instead of four!    Cheers!
reviews.author: Bruce Robb

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: This used to be my favorite app but it keeps crashing in the middle of my game, then it starts a new game. Fix it, its really annoying. It was good before that though.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: One of the world best ever game just gr8 no one can match where ever ur wat nice way to pass time just love it if it will come in HD then it will be more fun its my request to develooer plz make one hd version then no words for it to discribe it love it thanks a lot to developer for this Awesome n gr8 game thanx plz reply n make hd too olz
reviews.author: Mandeep Saijpal

reviews.title: Not random enough for my taste
reviews.comment: I don\'t like knowing that the game is a numbered game or that it has been solved N out of M times. Especially when playing Vegas rules, I want a randomized deck. This game encourages things I would consider cheating, like undo back to some point of a choice and trying the other way. Undo should be for when you realize you just made a mistake, not to try and retry the same game. But, that\'s what the game encourages by telling you there are a specific number of possible outcomes and some smaller number win.  Otherwise, the game is fairly decent. The controls are OK, though not perfect. It\'s too easy to accidentally hit something that causes you to exit the game. Then you have to go back in. And, it takes too many clicks to start a new game.
reviews.author: Scott Sobel

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This has always been a perfect running app on every device I have had.
